pkgmetadata.longdescription: SNP locations for Homo sapiens (dbSNP Build 141) // SNP locations and alleles for Homo sapiens extracted from NCBI dbSNP Build 141. The source data files used for this package were created by NCBI on May 1st, 2014, and contain SNPs mapped to reference genome GRCh38. Note that these SNPs can be "injected" in BSgenome.Hsapiens.NCBI.GRCh38 or in BSgenome.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg38.
